CustomField.defaultValue: 'This business planning document has been designed to capture the joint business objectives for the year as well as the investments that both parties plan to make in an effort to meet these business goals. Nokia recommends that the plan be documented and agreed upon annually, at the start of each calendar year. In addition, the plan will be governed by a partner / vendor relationship team on a quarterly basis. Both parties acknowledge that the data provided corresponds to the most accurate intent of business and related investments at the time the plan is agreed. This plan does not represent a contractual commitment that these business targets will be met.'+ BR() + BR() + 'The Business Plan is confidential between Nokia and the Partner and should not be shared outside of those two parties.'+ BR() + BR() + 'Fill in all the required fields (Red asterisks – required on creation, Black asterisks – required on submission for approval) on the Business Plan and go to related list to add Marketing Plans, Labs & Demos and Certifications & Accreditations. You are required to enter all these information before you can submit the Business Plan for approval.'
CustomField.label: Introduction
